settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.content:
At East Texas Electronics LLC, we strive to provide timely and affordable shipping options for our customers. The following outlines our shipping policy:

  • Packages weighing under 15.6 oz will be shipped via USPS Retail and should arrive within 3-5 business days from the date of shipment.
  • Media items, such as books, CDs, DVDs, and other similar products, will be sent via USPS Media Mail and should arrive within 3-5 business days from the date of shipment.
  • Packages weighing over 15.6 oz may be shipped via FedEx, UPS, or USPS, depending on which carrier can offer the most reasonable rate at the time of shipment. The shipping method chosen will be at our discretion, but we will always aim to select the most cost-effective option for our customers.

Once your order has been shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number, so you can track your package's progress and delivery status. We typically ship all orders within 1-2 business days of receiving them. However, please note that shipping times may vary based on the carrier and your location.

We do not offer international shipping at this time, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

If you have any questions or concerns about our shipping policy, please do not hesitate to contact us.

settings.heading: Returns & Refunds
settings.content:
We have a 14-day return policy, which means you have 14 days after receiving your item to request a return. To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

Exceptions/non-returnable items: Certain types of items cannot be returned, such as perishable goods (such as food, flowers, or plants), custom products (such as special orders or personalized items), and personal care goods (such as beauty products). We also do not accept returns for hazardous materials, flammable liquids, or gases. Please get in touch if you have questions or concerns about your specific item. Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns on sale items or gift cards.

Damages and issues: Please inspect your order upon reception and contact us immediately if the item is defective, damaged or if you receive the wrong item, so that we can evaluate the issue and make it right.

To start a return, please contact us at Contact@EastTexasElectronics.com. Please note that returns will need to be sent to the following address: 205 Renaissance Drive Hallsville, TX 75650. If your return is accepted, we’ll send you a return shipping label, as well as instructions on how and where to send your package. Items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted.

Exchanges: The fastest way to ensure you get what you want is to return the item you have, and once the return is accepted, make a separate purchase for the new item.

European Union 14 day cooling off period: Notwithstanding the above, if the merchandise is being shipped into the European Union, you have the right to cancel or return your order within 14 days, for any reason and without a justification. As above, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

Refunds: We will notify you once we’ve received and inspected your return, and let you know if the refund was approved or not. If approved, you’ll be automatically refunded on your original payment method within 10 business days. Please remember it can take some time for your bank or credit card company to process and post the refund too. If more than 15 business days have passed since we’ve approved your return, please contact us at Contact@EastTexasElectronics.com.

You can always contact us for any return questions at Contact@EastTexasElectronics.com. Thank you for shopping with East Texas Electronics LLC!
